Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids expressing wild-type and Y553C LRRK2.

Readout description.Result Description: Y553C LRRK2 showed reduced interaction with RAB10 compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each pull-down was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Experiment Method.Statistical analysis: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids expressing wild-type and Y553C LRRK2 along with RAB10.

Readout description.Result Description: Y553C LRRK2 showed decreased co-precipitation with RAB10 compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each co-precipitation was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Experiment Method.Statistical analysis: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Material used.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type or Y553C LRRK2 were treated with kinase inhibitors.

Readout description.Result Description: Y553C LRRK2 showed reduced phosphorylation at S935 compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each Western blot was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Experiment Method.Statistical analysis: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: GST pull-down assay with recombinant proteins

Material used.Description: Recombinant GST-LRRK2 (wild-type and Y553C) was incubated with RAB10.

Readout description.Result Description: Y553C LRRK2 showed reduced binding to RAB10 compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent pull-down experiments were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each pull-down was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: GST alone was used as a negative control.

Experiment Method.Statistical analysis: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.
